name: Streamus
description: A music player for Google Chrome. Converts YouTube into an iPod with pandora-like searching. Plays in the background!

browser_action.default_title: Streamus: Drop the 'ic' from streamed music.

nextVideo.description: Tells the player to play next video.

previousVideo.description: Tells the player to play previous video.

toggleVideo.description: Tells the player to play previous video.

content_security_policy: script-src 'self' 'unsafe-eval' https://graph.facebook.com https://www.youtube.com https://ssl.google-analytics.com https://gdata.youtube.com https://suggestqueries.google.com https://www.youtube.com https://s.ytimg.com; object-src 'self'
